headline: D.R. Horton's Charlotte South Division Announces Grand Opening Celebration in Charlotte, NC on September 10
summary: New Home Community Offering Ranch and Two-Story Single-Family Homes CHARLOTTE, NC / ACCESS Newswire / September 2, 2025 / Nestled in a premium location, centered between historic Downtown Belmont and stunning Uptown Charlotte, a new community is opening. ...

headline: U.S. homebuilding stocks in focus as Trump team weighs housing emergency
summary: Investing.com -- U.S. homebuilding stocks could see renewed attention on Tuesday after Treasury Secretary Scott Bessent said the Trump administration is considering declaring a national housing emergency this fall.

headline: Why Warren Buffett is Buying Lennar Stock, and How to Invest in Housing Like a Billionaire
summary: Even as single family builders are running into fundamental headwinds, multifamily builders are still finding traction with private equity investors. Here’s how Buffett is trading it - and you can, too.
